name: Gitleaks extension
description: Scan git repos (or files) for secrets using regex and entropy. This is a fork from Joost Voskuil https://github.com/JoostVoskuil/azure-devops-gitleaks
author: Yuen Ching Cheung (yuenching.cheung@cognizant.com)

inputs.name: scanfolder
inputs.label: Scan Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the location to scan. Defaults to your sources directory.

inputs.name: configtype
inputs.label: Configuration Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if you want to use the default, predefined config or a custom config.

inputs.name: configfile
inputs.label: Config file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a custom config file inside your repo.

inputs.name: nogit
inputs.label: No-Git
inputs.helpMarkDown: Treat git repos as plain directories and scan those files.

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Verbose output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want gitleaks to prints verbose output.

inputs.name: uploadresults
inputs.label: Upload results
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option if you want to upload the results as an artifact.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Gitleaks version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the version of Gitleaks to use.
